body: A feeder in the depths can notice creatures by scent in a 180-foot radius underwater, and can detect blood in the water at a distance of up to 1 mile.
name: Keen Scent
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Sahuagin/Example Sahuagin/Feeder in the Depths/Feeder in the Depths/Special Abilities/Keen Scent
